channel.title: Php Kungfu on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Php Kungfu on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: something about spring..
item.description: makes me really happy. although there is nothing I hate more than to walk to work in the rain. hah. well hate is a rather STRONG word. I like the rain a lot actually. I just don’t like getting ready for work and then getting wet. normality is near! i am a magic man!i made a writeup about my ibook picture frame project.
